ComicInfo.Summary:
Avril, Baba Yaga, and Dartanian fight side by side to rid the world of an implicit evil. Meanwhile, Liza seeks revenge on The Wizard, but will she turn on Dartanian to achieve her own hidden objectives? And The origin of the Coven is finally revealed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sabine Rich | 1 | B | Cover B | Douglas Sirois | 2 | C | Cover C | Jamie Tyndall & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D | Cover D | Tina Valentino & Victor Bartlett | 4 | Note: The digital edition (10/28/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
